short_summary: Printing Services for standard size ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes
description: Amendment #1 : This amendment is raised to answer Bidders’ questions and revise the RFP.",
full_summary:
**Title:** Printing Services for Standard Size ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes
**Language:** English
**Reference Number:** cb-5771-17544691
**Version:** Amendment #3 to Solicitation #100023805
**Tender Announcement Date:** May 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 9, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites bids for the supply of standard size ESDC and Service Canada envelopes, as well as shipping services to distribute printed products to various locations across Canada.

**Service Requirements:**
The Contractor must print and deliver all items in full quantities, as per the Statement of Work (SOW).

**Deliverables:**
The Contractor is responsible for quality control of various print products and their distribution to final destinations. The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Important Details:**

* The Contract period is from the date of contract to March 31, 2024, inclusive.
* All deliverables must be received as specified in Annex C.
* The responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for contract award.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreements and Regionality:**
This requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and all deliverables must be received within Canada.

**Correspondence and Inquiries:**
Patrick Blais can be reached at nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca or (000) 000-0000 for any correspondence or inquiries regarding this opportunity.

**Tender Files:**
Attachments can be downloaded from the following links:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5771/rfp100023805.pdf (Solicitation)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5771/amendment1-rfp100023805.pdf (Amendment #1)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5771/annexb-annexc-rfp100023805.xlsx (Annex C)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5771/appendixa-adm-emp.zip (Appendix A - ADM-EMP)
